name: Marksman
desc: If unit's hit surpasses 100, extra hit is converted to crit.
components: (combat_calcs.accuracy(unit, unit.equipped_weapon) - combat_calcs.avoid(target, target.equipped_weapon, unit.equipped_weapon) - 100) if (combat_calcs.accuracy(unit, unit.equipped_weapon) - combat_calcs.avoid(target, target.equipped_weapon, unit.equipped_weapon) > 100) else 0
